### Genbank FASTA headers

```{r}
library(ape)
library(metacoder)
seq_path <- "/home/fosterz/Downloads/sequence.fasta"
sequences <- ape::read.FASTA(seq_path)
headers <- names(sequences)[1:10]

tax_info <- extract_taxonomy(headers,
                             regex = "^.*\\|(.*)\\|.*\\|(.*)\\|.*$",
                             key = c("item_id", other_id = "item_info"),
                             database = "ncbi")
```
